index: index }) const images = this.myRef.current.children; for (let i = 0; i < images.length; i++) { images[i].className = images[i].className.replace("active", ""); } images[index].className = "active"; } render() { const { products, index } = this.state; const { comment } = this.state; const { setComment } = this.setState; const onChangeHandler = (e) => { setComment(e.target.value); }; return ( <>
{ products.map(item => (
